title: Employment income: alphabetical list of particular items

details.body:
### A
Additional housing costs allowances [EIM02000](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM02000.htm)
### B
Bank charges [EIM01010](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01010.htm)
Board and lodging [EIM01020](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01020.htm)
Board and lodging: example [EIM01025](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01025.htm)
### C
Car parking expenses or facilities [EIM01030](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01030.htm)
Christmas presents or bonuses [EIM01040](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01040.htm)
Commutation payments [EIM01050](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01050.htm)
Club membership fees [EIM01060](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01060.htm)
Compensation for loss of office [EIM02100](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM02100.htm)

### D

### E

Expenses payments and reimbursements [EIM01110](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01110.htm)
### F
Financial loss allowances [EIM01120](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01120.htm)
Free of tax payments [EIM07700](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM07700.htm)
Further education and training costs [EIM01200](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01200.htm)

Further education and training costs: work-related training: excluded expenditure/apportionment of costs [EIM01250](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01250.htm)
Further education and training costs: work-related training: travel and subsistence costs [EIM01260](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01260.htm)
Further education and training costs: work-related training: incidental overnight expenses [EIM01270](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01270.htm)
Further education and training costs: work-related training: provision of assets [EIM01280](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM01280.htm)
